tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been visiting this doctor for both of my kids from the last 6 years. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******** *** never visited second time for the same problem. She gives quality time for all patients and very friendly. 
-Ves: waiting time is more. Mosquito problem some times.  But still, I strongly recommend this doctor ** * ***** *** ** *** **** ** **** ** *** *****
Doctor is nice and genuine to heart. Knows her stuff well. Follows rule and regulations for vaccinations.
She is friendly  as well as professional... explained well the issue.* * ****** ********* *** *********** ********* straight to the issue n made it clear in simple way..

review: The doctor was least bothered about the treatment and suggestions that we were looking for but instead trying to sell her vaccination to us.
The doctor was patient enough to hear the history of my daughter and helped us with the relevant treatment
